snippet: The act of replacing the pages in a coveted day planner is more than a practical task; it’s a ritual.
abstract: Sloane Crosley First Person column describes how the act of replacing the pages in her coveted Louis Vuitton day planner at the end of every year helps her track her life in both an emotional and practical way.
lead_paragraph: The act of replacing the pages in a coveted day planner is more than a practical task; it’s a ritual.

headline.seo: A Yearly Date With the Planner
headline.main: A Yearly Date With Fleetwood Mac and the Planner
headline.print_headline: A Yearly Date With Fleetwood Mac and the Planner
